name: Not for the Faint of Heart
name_original: Not for the Faint of Heart
description:
Discover the meaning of fear as you explore a maze with only one goal, ESCAPE! As isolation and paranoia seep through the walls, you’ll have to avoid any obstacles on your way. In a warehouse where light will be your only partner, play a Virtual Reality Horror Game that will shake your world. Some things in life are funnier than others.

Required Systems:

Desktop/Laptop with GPU of GTX980 and Above or any that can run VR

Oculus Rift or HTC Vive
